title: Enhancing Programming Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based English Speaking Proficiency Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and fundamental smartphone usage abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can record a 10-minute English presentation and receive peer feedback
Learners can improve pronunciation and expression accuracy by 30% through peer feedback at least twice a week
Learners can complete self-directed English speaking projects at least once a month using a mobile application

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
